name: TriggerFinger
description:
How to Play - Select a difficulty. After the countdown, you must Draw as quickly as possibly. This is done my pressing Enter/Space or Left Clicking.

But if you click too soon, you lose the standoff.

TriggerFinger is a one button Hard as nails reflex game!

Set a High Kill Streak but be careful, the Draw countdown is randomized in length and can change from time to time!

Also, be sure to take some screenshots of your best Kill Streaks!

Android version coming soon!

Thanks for playing!
